boardgame.name: RAF
boardgame.description: This solitaire game of the Battle of Britain is card-driven with card decks covering Events, Attacking Forces and suspected targets. Game mechanisms deal with Radar warning(and lack of), weather and observer corps. The cardstock map covers southern England with graphics for airfields, industrial sites and ports._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the back of the box:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You control British, Commonwealth, Polish and Czech Air Force Squadrons, positioning the day's patrols where you believe the Nazis will strike. Day after bloody day, the RAF must rise to battle the modern fighters of Luftflotte 2 and 3 while Nazi bombers pound England into ruin - and submission. You must intercept German bombers, sacrificing dwindling men and equipment to halt the German war machine._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game system controls the Luftwaffe, directing a coherent bombing campaign against targets vital to British survival. A unique card system hides the strengths, compositions, and targets of the German strikes until after you've decided where your squadrons will patrol, and which raids you'll intercept. You make the decisions that could save democracy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;RAF offer three scenarios. The Hardest Days, The Thin Blue Line, and The Battle of Britain cover the entire struggle from beginning to end. The game is playable in as few as 3 hours or as many as 10._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;RAF includes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One full-color 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; map of southern England_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 160 full-color counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 134 target, event, and force cards (the rules correctly indicate 134 playable and numbered cards. There are 3 blanks in each set that are not used in the game bringing the physical count to 143 - 144 including dummy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;title_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 16-page rules book_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One six-sided die_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Counter tray with lock-on lid_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game scale is Gruppen and Squadrons with one-day turns._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For one player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Three to ten hours to play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ages 12 and up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Gift - Card sleeves. One of the best solitaire games I ever played. Lot of fun. English rules.

Good copy of RAF. Everything is there and in excellent condition. Punched but close to new. Great game.

Okay, I will be honest with you, I think $39 is too much for you to pay for this game. However, with one just selling for $80, another for $72, and Troll _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Toad asking $116, I figure I’ll offer this one for your consideration. As you can probably tell from the picture, this is the West End Games version of RAF. This game is in great shape and its raves from fellow geeks is well deserved. It was sold to me as “complete” but alas, the seller lied. Imagine that! However, I will not do the same to you. I inventoried everything and one German Me109 fighter plane is missing (II/JG 2 a 1o0 3 plane). This is not a big deal as it is easy to use a substitute counter. I’ve included two blank 5/8” counters for this purpose. I always planned to print out a replacement for this plane using the counter images here on the geek but have not gotten around to it. The picture is of the actual game for sale. Write with any questions. I only ask for actual postage, estimated at $6 for priority mail in the US. Better yet, stop by and pick it up!
Complete good players copy.
Buyer pays exact shipping costs
RAF - WWII Solo Air Combat. 100% complete. I welcome international buyers!

This solitaire game of the Battle of Britain is card-driven with card decks covering Events, Attacking Forces and suspected targets. Game mechanisms deal with Radar warning(and lack of), weather and observer corps. The cardstock map covers southern England with graphics for airfields, industrial sites and ports. From the back of the box: You control British, Commonwealth, Polish and Czech Air Force Squadrons, positioning the day_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s patrols where you believe the Nazis will strike. Day after bloody day, the RAF must rise to battle the modern fighters of Luftflotte 2 and 3 while Nazi bombers pound England into ruin - and submission. You must intercept German bombers, sacrificing dwindling men and equipment to halt the German war machine. The game system controls the Luftwaffe, directing a coherent bombing campaign against targets vital to British survival. A unique card system hides the strengths, compositions, and targets of the German strikes until after you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve decided where your squadrons will patrol, and which raids you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll intercept. You make the decisions that could save democracy. RAF offer three scenarios. The Hardest Days, The Thin Blue Line, and The Battle of Britain cover the entire struggle from beginning to end. The game is playable in as few as 3 hours or as many as 10. RAF includes: One full-color 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; map of southern England 160 full-color counters 143 target, event, and force cards (the rule book contains a misprint) 16-page rules book One six-sided die Counter tray with lock-on lid Game scale is Gruppen and Squadrons with one-day turns. For one player. Three to ten hours to play. Ages 12 and up. Postage £3.00 2nd class UK Ask for other postage rates or postage rates to other countries.
Price is $15.00 PLUS Shipping Costs
